altername_name: Devenez un Génie: Méthodes de Calcul Mental du Professeur Sakurai
name: Maths Made Simple
overview: Learn simple and fun ways to perform complex calculations Lesson mode with 17 different calculation methods Choice of gameplay modes including Lesson, Quiz, Drill and Skill Exam Ambling Arithmetic's minigame, an endurance mode to check your true maths skill Nine different costumes for the main character including a professor, magician and explorer
